attributes.additional_details: More holidays for students is important as it allows them to do their hobbies and more creative things over their holidays whilst still having the academic learning from school this will help them in the future as it allows them to have better traits for jobs in the future. Many parents and children believe the holidays are too short and dont allow them to fully develop their creative hobbies. Therefore more holidays would allow these students to thrive and flurish in the future.
attributes.background: More holidays are im portant to everyone as it allows us to build confidence in our creative hobbies outside of school as there is little to no time to do any creative things with homewrok and schopl piling up

rejection.details:
The Government sets the minimum days schools must meet per year. 

You could start a new petition to reduce the total number of days schools must open for annually. This would not apply to academies or private schools because they can set their own holidays.
